text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus hendersonianus is a species of plant in the family Fagaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. It is threatened by habitat loss.
text.References: Chua, L.S.L. (1998). "Lithocarpus hendersonianus". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T36323A9994569. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T36323A9994569.en. Retrieved 18 December 2017.
